sys_script_client.description: Requirement: When the u_victim_email field value changes, the system should fetch related victim details (First Name, Last Name, Phone Number, and Victim status) from the sys_user table and populate the corresponding fields in the form. This process is facilitated using a client script to trigger the onChange event and a script include for server-side processing.
sys_script_client.name: PopulateVictimDetailsOnEmailChange
